name: Prototype TD
description: Prototype TD is a tower defense game which includes rogue-like elements to make each game different. Different towers will be available each game and the starting map is randomly generated as well so it's not possible to win the same way every time.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
